title: Girly Girlz! Be just like your doll!
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:just-girly-things]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:text-style]]

[[>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
CW: This piece contains mentions of the GOI Just Girly Things, TERFs, brainwashing, body horror, misogyny, fatphobia, child abuse, and brainwashing of children. Please read with caution.

The views expressed by the author are not her own. It is a commentary. 
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-cw]]
[[/>]]


[[module CSS]]
.light {display:block; background:#fffafa; color: #08090a; padding: 5px 10px 5px 10px; border: solid 1px pink}
.lightquote {color: #839496; background-color: #F8F9F9;border: solid 3px #EBEDEF;border-radius: 10px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 5px; width: 85%; margin: 0px 0px 5px; font-size: 110%}
.lighthighlight {background-color: #F8F9F9; color: #939BA6; font-family:monospace; font-size: 125%}
.user1 {font-weight: bold;color: #c0e3ea}
.user2 {font-weight: bold;color: #ff0066}
.tag {color: #7289DA}
[[/module]]

@@ @@

[[div class="light"]]

+ Girly Girlz are online!

[[size 125%]]###db9aac|__AngelicBunny__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|March 28th, 2019##[[/size]]

------

Hewo everyone! ٩(◕‿◕｡)۶ I'm suuuuuwwwupppperrrr excited to announce the project I've been wowrking on is finally out! (＠＾◡＾) I've been vewwwwwy secretive abouwt it, but thanks to Rosemary, they're finally here! 

Girly Girlz are a brand of fashion dolls that make YOU more doll like! (*^‿^*) the brand consists of 7 girly girlz! Evelyn, Maya, Rose, Pipa, Tera, Jayden, and Tyla! All with unique looks :3 You can choose which one you want to look like! Skin color doesn't change because you're puuuurfect the way u are tho ;3 but not tooooo purfect! 

Just ask and I will give u one for free! [# Here] is where you can check them out and purchase as many as you want! 

What do u think of them? (☆ω☆)

Thwank wuw again to my Bestie Rosemary for helping me get this project off the ground! 

[[module css]]
#page-content hr {
    background-color: #ff57a8;
    height: 2px;
   margin: .75rem 0;
}
[[/module]]
------

[[=]]
+ Comments
[[/=]]
@@ @@

------

[[size 125%]]###e0c579 |__MarvelousMelly__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###f54272|March 28th, 2019##[[/size]]

That’s sooooooo cool! :D I loved dolls when I was younger! Toats getting Tera! I've found I want to be taller! All the dolls are tall but Tera is my fav! 

------

[[size 125%]]###f018b3|__BabyBella__## [[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|March 28th, 2019##[[/size]]

I’ve GOT to get Jayden for my daughter Emma. They have similar hair styles! I think in other ways she needs to look like her though, my daughter eats too much. Can I get her? 

------

[[size 125%]]###db9aac|__AngelicBunny__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|March 28th, 2019##[[/size]]

##hotpink|In response to:## ###f018b3|__BabyBella__##

OF COURSE! Iwll have to awsk Rosemary actuallyyyyy, she’s in possession of most of the dolls ;3 ###ba1149|@Rosemarydarling##

------


[[size 125%]]###ba1149 |__Rosemarydarling__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|March 28th, 2019##[[/size]]

##hotpink|In response to:## ###f018b3|__BabyBella__##, ###db9aac|__AngelicBunny__##

Follow [# this] link and you should be good girl! 

------

[[size 125%]]###f018b3|__BabyBella__## [[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|March 28th, 2019##[[/size]]

##hotpink|In response to:## ###ba1149 |__Rosemarydarling__##

Tysm! 

[[/div]]

[[module css]]
.text-container{
box-shadow:1px 1px 7px purple inset;
background-color:#ffe6f5;
}
.sent .text{
background-color:pink;
color:black;
}
.recv .text{
background-color:#FF647F;
color:black;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="text-container-wrap"]]

+++ ###ff5cc2|♡Chat with Rosemarydarling and KeeLee♡##
[[div class="text-container"]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]] Hey Kee! Just wanted to say dolls are up and running! Bunny was easy enough to manipulate lol.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]Haha, some of them tend to be.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]I thought I was extra clever suggesting she name one of the dolls 'Evelyn'.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]So what's your plan to make sure Evelyn's daughter gets one of these dolls?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Well I was discussing with Angel who lives in her area. We don't think there's a reason to be discreet. [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]What are you suggesting?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Having Angel give the doll to her daughter. She'd be a monster to take away a toy from a little girl LOL.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]That's perfect. Evelyn doesn't know what the dolls do. She'll likely be suspicious of us, but there's nothing she can do about it. [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Exactly.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ __Forum: PROJECT EVE__

[[size 75%]] ###ff3968| (Previous) **__1__**, __2__, __3__, __4__ (Next)##[[/size]]
[[/=]]

------

[[size 125%]]###FF8FC6|__Angelinwings__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 2nd, 2019##[[/size]] 

Hey everyone! I've got some updates about project eve! Evelyn's daughter LOVED the doll. Evelyn was salty as heck though lol. She just kept glaring at me while her daughter was jumping up and down in excitement, happy to have a doll named after her mom. I'm so excited for this!

------

[[size 125%]]###e1b8ff |__Claraisafairy__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 2nd, 2019##[[/size]] 

##hotpink|In response to:## ###FF8FC6|__Angelinwings__##

OMG that's SO cool! I'm so happy her daughter liked it! I know we're sure to get Ev back in no time now! I have some pictures I took of her front yard you can view them through [# here] 

------

[[size 125%]]###70f1ff |__Floratheflowergirl__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 2nd, 2019##[[/size]] 

##hotpink|In response to:## ###FF8FC6|__Angelinwings__## , ###e1b8ff |__Claraisafairy__##

I've been loving my doll of Evelyn, I'm so much skinnier now! AND I can continue to eat whatever I want! Her fat pig of a daughter needs that too. Anyone get pics of her and her daughter? 

------

[[size 125%]]###9372cc|__WhimsicalLily__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 2nd, 2019##[[/size]] 

##hotpink|In response to:## ###FF8FC6|__Angelinwings__## , ###70f1ff |__Floratheflowergirl__##

I did! [# check it out]!

------

[[size 125%]]###70f1ff |__Floratheflowergirl__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 2nd, 2019##[[/size]] 


##hotpink|In response to:## ###FF8FC6|__Angelinwings__## , ###9372cc|__WhimsicalLily__##

OH WOW her daughter is UGO just like her! she was so much prettier when she was a part of JGT. Evelyn is in that image too, she's gained so much weight! Chunky pig. 

------

[[size 125%]]###9372cc|__WhimsicalLily__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 2nd, 2019##[[/size]] 

Not only that, but from what’s been observed she’s gotten so boyish! I peeked through her window once and saw her watching FOOTBALL. ON HER OWN. She’s not even married anymore! 

------

[[size 125%]]###FF8FC6|__Angelinwings__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 2nd, 2019##[[/size]] 

##hotpink|In response to:## ###70f1ff |__Floratheflowergirl__## , ###9372cc|__WhimsicalLily__##

Well her daughter is about to be setting a great example.

[[size 125%]]###d60056|__CutieKelly__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 9th, 2019##[[/size]]

Hey guys!  

Just wanted to update. I caught Evelyn outside of a bakery today with her daughter. Her daughter is getting skinnier, and is carrying the doll with her everywhere! Just thought you might want to know!

------

[[size 125%]]###d60056|__CutieKelly__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 9th, 2019##[[/size]]

Lol sorry *GIRlS not guys LOL

------


[[size 125%]]###70f1ff |__Floratheflowergirl__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 9th, 2019##[[/size]] 

##hotpink|In response to:## ###d60056|__CutieKelly__##

OMG???? SO IT'S WORKING! THANKS FOR LETTING US KNOW GIRL! Are her proportions looking more like the doll? 

------

[[size 125%]]###d60056|__CutieKelly__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 9th, 2019##[[/size]]

##hotpink|In response to:## ###70f1ff |__Floratheflowergirl__##

Oh uhhhh IDK HAHAH LOL! I didn't see enough of her for that! 

------

[[size 125%]]###e1b8ff |__Claraisafairy__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 9th, 2019##[[/size]] 

##hotpink|In response to:## ###d60056|__CutieKelly__##


A bakery? Omg I could only catch her outside her house! Maybe we could meet up and you could teach me your secrets!

------

[[size 125%]]###d60056|__CutieKelly__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 9th, 2019##[[/size]]

##hotpink|In response to:## ###e1b8ff |__Claraisafairy__##

Oh UH I'm kinda busy with my hubby and kids! I just happened to catch her, ya know?

------

[[size 125%]]###e1b8ff |__Claraisafairy__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 9th, 2019##[[/size]] 

##hotpink|In response to:## ###d60056|__CutieKelly__##

Yeah that makes sense! I hope you and your family are having the perfect life! :3

------

[[size 125%]]##hotpink|__KeeLee__##[[/size]] [[size small]]##hotpink|April 9th, 2019##[[/size]]

I do as well. I haven't seen you around in awhile, Kelly. Let's chat in dms so I can get you reaccustomed to things.

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-container-wrap"]]

+++ ###ff5cc2|♡Chat with CutieKelly and KeeLee♡##
[[div class="text-container"]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]Hello, Evelyn. I didn't think you would ever log in again. I thought you were done with us.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]I didn't either but you and your PIECE OF SHIT CULT ARE TARGETING MY DAUGHTER[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]Targeting is such a harsh word. We're just trying to show her the true ways of girlhood since you won't do it.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]I should've thrown away that godforsaken doll. I should've KNOWN. Like I knew Angel was up to no good but I couldn't even begin to imagine what it did! MY DAUGHTER LOOKS LIKE AN ALIEN AND SHE'S SPOUTING ALL THIS CRAP! She’s got these stick skinny limbs and these gigantic shiny eyes! Her torso practically the size of a large water bottle! Her fingers are all spindly! WHAT DID YOU DO TO MY BABY[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]You mean the same 'crap' you used to spout? And we just made her better. [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]When I was brainwashed by YOU! How I got away I don't even know! I regret the hurt I caused. The terrible person I became. But I will NEVER let you make me that person again. Better? BETTER?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]How sweet. But you know that's not how this ends. I'm of half a mind to ban you for pulling this, but at the same time, I think letting you stay will bring you back to the true ways of girlhood.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]Yeah in your DREAMS[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]We'll see how things go.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[/div]]

+ Newbie here…

[[size 125%]]###e417ff|__Emilylikescookies__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|April 25th, 2019##[[/size]]

------

Uh hello! My name is Emily and im 9. I was told to go here by another girl. I recently got Evelyn from Girly Girlz and I started changing to look like her and she is very pretty but I feel kinda weird with my fingers being long and my eyes being bigger and stuff and I wanted to get some advice thank you :)
------

[[size 125%]]###e1b8ff |__Claraisafairy__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8FC6| April 25th, 2019##[[/size]] 

OM HI! IT IS SOOOOO NICE TO HAVE YOU HERE! You are beautiful just the way you are girl! Well, the way you are now! I’m sure your eyes are nice and glistening! 

------


[[size 125%]]###f018b3|__BabyBella__## [[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|April 25th, 2019##[[/size]]

I'll have to hook you up with my daughter! She's ten! I'm sure you'll be besties! She has a doll too! She looks like Rose now! Girly enjoy your new look! And don’t listen to anyone that says otherwise! 

------



[[size 125%]]##hotpink|__KeeLee__##[[/size]] [[size small]]##hotpink|April 9th, 2019##[[/size]]

Welcome, Emily. I'm so happy you've joined our site.

------

[[size 125%]]###e417ff|__Emilylikescookies__##[[/size]] [[size small]]###FF8ABF|April 25th, 2019##[[/size]]

Thank you everyone! Im still feeling weird but I like your advice and I will listen to it :) 

------

[[size 125%]]##hotpink|__KeeLee__##[[/size]] [[size small]]##hotpink|April 9th, 2019##[[/size]]

##hotpink|In response to:## ###e417ff|__Emilylikescookies__##

Of course. Just let us know if you need anything dear. We'll help raise you right.

[[/div]]

[[div class="text-container-wrap"]]

+++ ###ff5cc2|♡Chat with CutieKelly and KeeLee♡##
[[div class="text-container"]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]There's no getting her back is there[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]No. You were a very rare case.
[[/div]]

[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]I'm not letting her on your site. I'll take away all her electronics![[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]You know that won't work. She'll find a way. We always do. //I// always do. [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]Have a nice life, Evelyn. And if you ever want to return to true girlhood, give me a call.[[/span]][[/span]]
[[/div]]



[[/div]]

[[/div]]
